metadata.title: CVE-2024-26774 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ext4:avoid dividing by 0 in mb_update_avg_fragment_size() when block bitmapcorrupt Determine if bb_fragments is 0 instead of determining bb_free toeliminate the risk of dividing by zero when the block bitmap is corrupted.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
